thread.title: Kim Jong Un's high security summit sendoff

title: Kim Jong Un's high security summit sendoff
text:
Kim Jong Un's high security summit sendoff 4:35pm BST - 00:34
Surrounded by bodyguards, the limousine carrying North Korean leader Kim Jong Un returns to the North after Friday's historic summit with South Korean President Moon Jae-in. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Surrounded by bodyguards, the limousine carrying North Korean leader Kim Jong Un returns to the North after Friday's historic summit with South Korean President Moon Jae-in.
